release.action: Added reports selection to the POM editor.
Added testing information to the POM editor.
Added build information to the POM editor.
Added SCM UI to the POM editor. Editor allows editing of project versions, branches and SCM repository.
Added developers and contributors UI to the POM editor.
Added mailing lists UI to the POM editor.
Added dependency UI to the POM editor.
Added manual installation instructions.

Added an initial version of the graphical POM editor. Currently, only a small subset of the POM properties are supported, but they will grow very soon.
The editor works closely with the IDEA API so that save and load operations are treated the same as standard file operations. The POM editor is also constantly synchronized with the underlying file, so that editing the file with the POM text editor (also provided) or even from outside the IDE will synchronize the graphical editor, and vice-versa.
Synchronization with the IDEA project and module settings is not yet implemented.
POM selection for modules has been removed. POM files are now automatically detected by searching for files named 'project.xml' in every module file's directory.
Try to guess Maven home on startup, if not set by the user.
Fixed exception that occured when adding new modules with no POM attached.
Added custom icons for goals and plugins in trees.
Upgraded plugin to JDK 1.5 - required by IDEA since build 3311.
Removed the GoalsProvider interface in favor of direct use of IGoalsGrabber. This is now possible since the UI elements can interact with mevenide objects (see next jdom issue for details).

JetBrains has upgraded the JDOM version they use in the IDE from 0.8 to 1.0, which enables us now to restore the original plugin architecture to a single Maven project and remove the custom class loader implementation since it is no longer needed. Therefor, reintegrated mevenide-idea-main, mevenide-idea-modeland mevenide-idea-masterback into a single project called mevenide-idea.

Automatically update goals tree if either the maven.xml or project.xml files are changed. Synchronization will occur whether the change came from inside the IDE (e.g. the user has edited the files) or from outside the IDE (e.g. opening notepad and manually modifying the files).
Showing goal descriptions in Goals tool window/pane.
Added a short installation guide.

Split project into subprojects:
mevenide-idea-master: a template parent project for the other modules
mevenide-idea-main: the main project - provides the UI and plugin wrapper.
mevenide-idea-model: interacts with mevenide and exposes project information for the mevenide-idea-main module.
Modified code base to use Mevenide libraries instead of custom code that does the same.

Created initial code base of the plugin. Current code supports:
Specifying a POM file on a per-module basis.
Specifying "favorite" goals for each module, for easy access.
An Ant-like tool window displaying each IDEA module's available goals, as defined in maven.xml.
Execution of selected goal(s) in a dedicated execution console, much like the standard Run console of IDEA. Each execution can be stopped, or paused.
Specifying a different Maven home than the one defined in your MAVEN_HOME environment variable and PATH.
